column5: Our place is good for a (the bed is a Daybed that has a pullout bed underneath) solo adventurer or business traveler. A nice simple clean room with a private bath, ceiling fan, TV and mini-fridge. The common area is a full kitchen and living room, with access to washer and dryer. We are 3 miles from the Chisolm Trail Parkway, and 25 minutes from downtown Fort Worth, and 20 minutes from the hospital district.  Contact host
column8: Quiet room in a quiet home.
